title: Commander Moves
description: Schema for Commander character moves data

id.description: Unique identifier for the move (must be unique across all moves)

description.description: Detailed description of when and how to use this move

outcomes.description: Array of possible outcomes based on dice roll ranges

text.description: Description of what happens on this outcome

bullets.description: Optional bullet points for choices or effects

pick.description: Array of options for pick moves (multiple selections allowed)

pickOne.description: Array of options for pickOne moves (radio buttons, only one selection allowed)

multiplePick.description: Number of columns for pick/pickOne options (creates grid layout with separate selections per column)

takefrom.description: List of roles this move can be taken from

multiple.description: Number of checkboxes to show (for moves that can be taken multiple times)

category.description: Optional category for grouping moves (moves without a category appear first under 'Moves')

grantsCard.description: Card name to grant when this move is selected
